title: Priyanka Chopra can't handle heat in hot wings challenge
text:
Priyanka Chopra took on the Hot Ones challenge, and was left in tears by the insanely spicy chicken wings.

The Sky Is Pink actress popped up on the Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon, when she took on YouTuber Sean Evans’ infamous task.

And the whole thing has got us reaching for some water in solidarity.

Things started off a little tame, with the 37-year-old chomping into a mild wing, while being questioned by Sean – who had joined the pair for the segment.

She took a second to reveal that she had convinced husband Nick Jonas to take part, which led to a ‘brutal three days’ for the singer.

Way too much information there, hun.

‘I did tell him that he needs to do this for the Indians,’ she admitted.

Priyanka Chopra couldn’t handle the heat during the hot wings challenge (Picture: FilmMagic)

‘Now that he’s married to my entire country, he needs to bring it home for us. So he really tried to get it.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘But after your show, it was a long conversation — and a brutal three days.’

However, it might be Priyanka’s turn for the ‘brutal three days’ herself, as she could barely keep it together by that last wing, almost crying from the heat.

In fact, she had to get up and pace around the studio, while dabbing at her eyes, as Jimmy struggled to get through the segment.

Priyanka is a fully-fledged Jonas Brothers groupie – but that hasn’t always been the case (Picture: Getty)

Someone get them both a gallon of milk ASAP.

During her appearance on the show, Priyanka also lifted the lid on her relationship with Nick, and how she’ll cope when he jets off on tour with the Jonas Brothers.

‘It’s been so great,’ she told the presenter. ‘They’re doing like 70 live shows in 3 months.’

However, she also confessed that she didn’t know much about the band before tying the knot with the Sucker singer.

Seriously? Burnin’ Up still bangs so hard.

‘I’m gonna get killed for this, but before I got married and started dating Nick, I didn’t know too much about the euphoria that is the Jonas Brothers, she added.

‘I’m a full groupie now.’
